properties.name: resultDescriptor
properties.description: a closure ``(result) => result``, will be invoked before result is access to dom.

properties.name: keyForItems
properties.description: The field name of the items in the responsed result.

properties.name: keyForPageResult
properties.description: The field name of the page result in the responsed result.

attributes.name: result-descriptor
attributes.description: a closure ``(result) => result``, will be invoked before result is access to dom.

attributes.name: key-for-items
attributes.description: The field name of the items in the responsed result.

attributes.name: key-for-page-result
attributes.description: The field name of the page result in the responsed result.

methods.name: query

params.name: input
params.description:
支持3种类型： Request|String|Object
     1. Request实例
     2. String：请求url
     3: Object： 对象结构要求 { url , data, handleAs}
         url：必填项
         data：可选
         handleAs：string, 可选，默认值是"json"， 取值范围: text|json|blob|formData|arrayBuffers

methods.name: post
